column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Even with viewing this museum online
column2: it is nothing compared to the experience in person. There was so much more I got to see that I wasn't expecting. From paintings to photography
column4: there's so much art to digest and appreciate. If you are looking to fill up your trip itinerary or looking for something to do on the weekend
column5: you need to make plans to come here. I hope I can come by again soon!
